heading: HR02577
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY, COMMITTEE ON GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY AND OTHER APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION TO REMOVE FROM OFFICE ASSISTANT SECRETARY REDENTOR DELOLA OF THE DEPARTMENT OF ENERGY ("DOE") DUE TO HIS CONFLICT OF INTEREST AND SERIOUS IRREGULARITIES IN THE PERFORMANCE OF HIS FUNCTION
principal-authors: DATOL, FRANCISCO JR. G.; MONTORO, TEODORO "TED" G.;
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2019-05-29
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02577
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY, COMMITTEE ON GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY AND OTHER APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION TO REMOVE FROM OFFICE ASSISTANT SECRETARY REDENTOR DELOLA OF THE DEPARTMENT OF ENERGY ("DOE") DUE TO HIS CONFLICT OF INTEREST AND SERIOUS IRREGULARITIES IN THE PERFORMANCE OF HIS FUNCTION
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : DATOL, FRANCISCO JR. G., MONTORO, TEODORO "TED" G.
DATE FILED : 2019-05-29
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2019-05-29
